abstract: Apple chief Steven P. Jobs faced a barrage of questions from shareholders about the company’s handling of stock option grants and its policy of executive compensation, during a an annual meeting Thursday. But Mr. Jobs, with his typical flair for showmanship, elicited laughs and applause during the meeting despite rankling questions.
lead_paragraph: Apple chief Steven P. Jobs faced a barrage of questions from shareholders about the company’s handling of stock option grants and its policy of executive compensation, during a an annual meeting Thursday. But Mr. Jobs, with his typical flair for showmanship, elicited laughs and applause during the meeting despite rankling questions.

headline.main: Apple Shareholders Question Jobs on Options
